All Classes and Interfaces|All Packages|Constant Field Values

U

UIBoard - Static variable in class controller.UIBoardActions
The user interface TicTacToe board which will get updated and display the moves of the players after every move is made.
UIBoardActions - Class in controller
This class contains utility methods for handling user interaction with the UI Tic-Tac-Toe board, which is clicking the tiles.
UIBoardActions() - Constructor for class controller.UIBoardActions
 
UIConstants - Class in view
This class contains all the constants used for setting up the user interface (UI) of the Tic-Tac-Toe game.
UIConstants() - Constructor for class view.UIConstants
 
UIElements - Class in view
This class contains methods that create and return different elements of the user interface for all scenes in all game states such as labels, buttons and combo-boxes for the Tic-Tac-Toe GUI.
UIElements() - Constructor for class view.UIElements
 
updatePlayerLabels() - Static method in class controller.UIBoardActions
Helper method to update the color of the player labels to reflect the current player's turn.
USER_SELECTION_SCENE_SPACING - Static variable in class view.UIConstants
The spacing between elements in the user selection scene (symbol, turn picked)
userFirst - Static variable in class controller.GUI
true if user wants to go first in the multi-player game mode, false otherwise.
UserPlayer - Class in model
This class represents a human player in a Tic-Tac-Toe game and implements the Player interface.
UserPlayer(char) - Constructor for class model.UserPlayer
Construct a user player by initializing its symbol field.
